title: Update contact email and website in Settings tab

requirements.summary: Update the email address displayed in the Settings/About screen to 'info@mawalkingradio.com'
acceptanceCriteria: The Settings tab displays 'info@mawalkingradio.com' as the contact email
The email address is clickable and opens the default mail client with the correct recipient

file_operations.description: Update the email address from the current value to 'info@mawalkingradio.com'. Ensure the email is wrapped in a mailto: link that opens the user's default mail client when clicked. Locate the existing email display section in the About or Contact Info area and replace the email text content while preserving the link functionality.

requirements.summary: Update the website URL displayed in the Settings/About screen to 'www.mawalkingradio.com'
acceptanceCriteria: The Settings tab displays 'www.mawalkingradio.com' as the website URL
The website URL is clickable and opens the correct website in a new tab

file_operations.description: Update the website URL from the current value to 'www.mawalkingradio.com'. Ensure the URL is wrapped in an anchor tag with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security. The href should use 'https://www.mawalkingradio.com' (with protocol) while displaying 'www.mawalkingradio.com' as the visible text. Locate the existing website display section in the About or Contact Info area and replace the URL content while preserving the external link functionality.
